lambdabettergrass.menu.info.1: The mod uses resource pack files to determine which blocks are affected.
lambdabettergrass.menu.info.2: This means to enable or disable the Better Grass feature on blocks
lambdabettergrass.menu.info.3: it has to be modified with resource packs.
lambdabettergrass.menu.title: LambdaBetterGrass configuration
lambdabettergrass.tooltip.mode:
Enables the better grass feature.
 - %s disables the better grass feature entirely.
 - %s will copy the top texture on every side of the grass block. Similar to OptiFine's Fast option.
 - %s will connect the grass block textures like OptiFine's Fancy option.
 - %s will connect the grass block textures and smoothen the side textures of nearby grass blocks.
